byline.contributor: Yasser Alarami contributed reporting from Sana, Yemen, and David E. Sanger from Washington.

abstract: Airstrikes, believed to have been carried out by American drones, kill at least nine people in southern Yemen, including senior official of regional branch of Al Qaeda; fighting also escalates in capital Sana, where at least 12 anti-government protesters are killed by security forces.
snippet: Airstrikes believed to be carried out by American drones killed at least nine people, and 12 protesters died in Sana.

headline.main: Strikes Hit Yemen as Violence Escalates in Capital
headline.print_headline: Fatal Strikes Hit Yemen As Violence Escalates
headline.seo: Fatal Airstrikes Hit Yemen as Protest Violence Escalates
